info.name: MySecondLife Enhancer Plus
info.description: Important: Click the "Show CSS Code" button first. The install button will work after that. I highly recommend this style that makes the "Show CSS Code" button much easier to find. ― This style removes the Second Life ads and increase the width of your feed and fix the navigator panel and the left panel to your screen for a better browsing experience. This style also increase the size of the thumbnails from small to large and some more other features as well. Read the additional information for further details. Related style: Make sure to also check out My Dark Second Life for a darker experience! Version: 1.0.4 | View change logs | View website
info.additionalInfo: Features: • Useless links removed such as What is Second Life? & Recommendations. • Fix the left navigation column and the main column to the browser screen to reduce unnecessary scrolling. • Increase the size of the screenshot thumbnails from small to already large-sized screenshots without having to zoom-in. • Increased the size of the zoomed 1st & 2nd Life display pictures for better viewing. • New icon added for the Edit Profile button and new style for the link Invite Your Friends!. Change log: Click here to view the change log on docs Google.
